string.text: Job done. Time to return to task giver.
Eliminate dangerous mutants
My job is to eliminate mutants in this area.
Recently some mutants have appeared and are threatening our operations. The commander is seeking someone who can take care of them. Here, take a look.
Great job! They didn't let our teams work...
Supply chain
My task is to neutralize the guards and deliver the containers.

Our patrols has reported the location of the supply unit at these coordinates. For some reason, the caravan has not yet reached the location of the group. They may have been hindered by mutant activity, bad weather, emissions, or something else. Search their caravan. Their supplies will be useful to our group. We will not stand for gratitude.
Honest pay for honest work. These things are really good, indeed.
Neutralization
I need to neutralize a group of enemy stalkers at this location.

Recently, a group of enemies appeared not far from us. It seems that these guys are quite capable for you, but do not overdo it - they are well-staffed and clearly looking for trouble. Good hunting, Stalker.
No problems, I hope? These guys were clearly ready for a fight. Excellent work.
Transaction
These bastards have betrayed their groups. My job is to kill them all. They will have a deal at the designated location.

A friend of mine decided to start a rat hunt in his group. I won't go into details - your task is to come to the meeting place and pick up the goods. By force. Bring the product to me, and I'll find a use for it.
Good job. They owe me a drink for this one. Here is your share.
Artifacts for everyone, for free
Doctor said that an artifact could be found here. Let's try my luck, then.

Our guys spotted the artifact as they were passing by. They had injured people with them, so they passed this information on to me. Since you have proven yourself well, I will give you this information for free. Keep working for our faction and you'll get a lot more.
Nothing. This line will not be shown in the game.
Artifact "Hunting"
Doctor told me this guy had an artifact. He isn't very friendly though...
This guy's group was looking for artifacts when our guys passed by. Don't you want to help the guy with his heavy load, so to speak?
Nothing. This line will not be shown in the game.
Equip
I have the opportunity to upgrade my equipment. I should use it..
It seems that our enemy has a promising squad, and their equipment is quite good. Don't you want to test your strength and weaken our enemies? And their gear will be your reward.
Nothing. This line will not be shown in the game.
